Microsoft's Server and Tools Business-in many ways the epicenter of its cloud strategy-is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of longtime division president Bob Muglia . While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer href="http://www.eweek.com/c/a/c/a/Windows/Apple-App-Store-Fight-Bob Muglia-Departure-Marked-Microsoft-Week-801641/"> wrote in a Jan. 10 email to employees announcing Bob Muglia 's removal.`` We are now ready to build on our success and move forWard Cunningham into the era of cloud computing.
